abstract: Stefan Kießling (German pronunciation: [ˈʃtɛfan ˈkiːslɪŋ]) (born 25 January 1984) is a German footballer who plays as a striker for Bayer Leverkusen. He has also represented the German national team six times.
comment: Stefan Kießling (German pronunciation: [ˈʃtɛfan ˈkiːslɪŋ]) (born 25 January 1984) is a German footballer who plays as a striker for Bayer Leverkusen. He has also represented the German national team six times.
